repnme.cdata!:
People's Democratic Republic of Yemen
            - Highway Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The First Highway Project consists of:
            (a) feasibility studies of selected roads totalling about
            500 miles; (b) detailed engineering of about 150 miles of
            roads, identified by the feasibility studies as having high
            economic priority for construction; (c) highway workshop and
            communicating equipment and spare parts for existing highway
            maintenance and workshop equipment; (d) provision of a
            technical assistance team to advise and assist in improving
            the organization, operations and methods of the Public Works
            Department (PWD); and (e) overseas fellowships for PWD staff.
